p: Antimicrobial activity of MEMP was tested by disc diffusion assay procedure against seven gram-positive and nine gram-negative bacteria where amoxicillin and streptomycin (30 µg/disc) were used as the standard along with 100 µg/disc of MEMP as test sample. The result is displayed in Table 5. From the result, it is vibrant that MEMP was notably effective against all the bacterial strains.
